casebody.data:
GREEN v. TURNER, WARDEN. No. 88,

Misc.

Decided November 25, 1968. Phil L. Hansen, Attorney General of Utah, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for a writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is vacated and the case is remanded to the Court of Appeals for further consideration in light of Garrison v. Patterson, 391 U. S. 464.
